titleStmt.title: A treatise concerning deniall of Christ: a subject of most high concernment for all those who intend to follow Christ. / Written by Christopher Blackwood, an unprofitable servant of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Blackwood, Christopher.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Edward Blackmore, at the signe of the Angell in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
